html.p: Now that you have a SCOM Dashboard containing the SplunkWeb widget, you are ready to run a search. In this example, we will execute a simple search that summarizes records pulled from Windows Event Logs.

ul.li: Open the Splunk dashboard view created earlier in this introductory tutorial. The dashboard will automatically authenticate with the configured SplunkWeb portal and display a Splunk search app.
Once the Splunk search app appears in the dashboard view, find the search query field near the top of the SplunkWeb user interface.
Enter this query into the search query field: sourcetype=WinEventLog:*|stats count by source
Click on the Search button to execute the search. The SplunkWeb search app will update with results.
